summary: Shake The Ground Under Your Feet
title: Shake The Ground Under Your Feet
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2ILWA1G

by mothmansupreme

‘Magic things’ Clint decides, running a hand down his face as he watches the cube react when a scientist pokes a metal stick at it, ‘are the worst.’

Now, his comrade, who came from a long line of geokinetics, which during a rather frustrating conversation about her abilities, she stressed they were not magic, just adaptations born from a minor mutation her ancestor possessed that rapidly evolved into a sort of sixth sense. She had a few quirks, which was only wearing sandals or going barefoot, grumbling when a restaurant didn’t have a vegetarian option besides salad, wearing what was definitely not battle-safe, being summed up as a pair of Kevlar elephant pants with a tank top woven from the same material, all brought together by thick leather wrappings on her forearms and from her shin down. To Clint, she looked like a hippie who could crush a skull between her thighs. Oh, and of course, her biggest quirk yet: she had a thing for rocks.

Words: , Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Nick Fury, Steve Rogers, Original Characters, Tony Stark, Bruce Banner, Thor (Marvel), Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Clint Barton, Maria Hill
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Reader, Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Clint Barton/Laura Barton
  • Additional Tags: geokinetic reader, y'know making the rocks move, basically earthbending


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2ILWA1G

title: Nightmares (you're my dream)
body:
by overthemoony

After a particular bad nightmare, Steve gets up and ends up in Tony’s lab, and talking + feelings ensue. No smut in the first chapter, but the next chapter will have a ton. Takes place some point after endgame, but everyone survives, Steve doesn’t go back in time, and Pepper and Tony just aren’t a thing anymore.

blog.name: s-horne
blog.title: it's like candyland 🍬
blog.description: tony stark, stony, superfamily, tonystarkdefencesquad    //    I also write stony - look for the tag 'i wrote a thing'

summary: Hi! If you take prompts, i was wondering if you would write something about Steve finding out that tony shaves his legs and lots...
question: Hi! If you take prompts, i was wondering if you would write something about Steve finding out that tony shaves his legs and lots of tenderness and softness between them? Thank you so much xxx
answer:
this fic contains talk of razors. though it is only shaving and no razor is specified, proceed with caution if need be x

“Tony? Are you in here?”

Steve stepped out of the elevator when it stopped on Tony’s floor, stifling a yawn behind his hand. It had been a long day, one that had dragged on and on and seemed like it was never going to end. All he wanted to do was crawl into bed and sleep all of his cares away.

He felt a little weird letting himself onto Tony’s floor. They’d been together for a few months and, whilst, Steve had explicit permission from Tony to let himself into Tony’s space whenever he wanted, he was still holding back. It felt strange to be there without Tony, without them stumbling into the wall when their attention was too wrapped up in the other.

“Tony?”

There was a muffled curse from the direction of the en-suite and Steve’s brow furrowed.

“Babe? Everything alright?”

There was another low curse and Steve’s feet started to take him towards Tony’s bedroom, worry taking over him. The bathroom door was open and the light on, a little steam still curling into the bedroom. Steve hesitated before poking his head into the room and any more questions he had died in his throat at the sight before him.

Tony was standing in front of his bathtub clad only in tight boxers that clung to every curve of his backside with one leg resting on the bath’s ceramic edge. A razor was clutched in his hand as he very carefully shaved from his ankle to his knee, wiping away shaving foam onto a blue towel in his hand.

“Hey,” Tony said softly, not looking up as he focused on his knee. “How was your day?”

“Fine,” Steve replied automatically, all of his attention solely on the way Tony’s thigh looked so wonderfully tanned against the sharp white of the streaks of foam on it and the contrast with the bath. Truth be told, he couldn’t remember a single detail about his day anymore. “What are you doing?”

“Shaving.” Tony wiped his razor and bent forward, rolling his foot to change the angle of his leg. When he bent forward a little too far, he winced and let out a muffled curse.

Steve surged forward, hovering next to Tony. “Are you okay? Did you cut yourself?”

“Nicked it, I think,” Tony muttered, grimacing as a hand lifted to rest at the base of his spine. “But it was more my back. I can’t turn that way to see very well anymore.”

“Do you…” Steve trailed off and swallowed, eyes fixed on Tony’s leg. “Do you want a hand?”

Tony looked up with his eyes narrowed ever so slightly and when Steve met his gaze, he didn’t back down. “A hand?”

“Yeah.” Steve cleared his throat and hunched in on himself a little. “I just thought that, what with your back, you might need help.”

Tony paused for a moment, enough to make Steve shrink back even further, before he relaxed minutely and silently held out his hand. Steve edged forward and carefully, oh so carefully, took the razor that was being handed to him.

“Where – where do I start?”

“Just follow the lines.” Tony’s voice was tight, almost as though he was holding his breath. “Just go where the foam is.”

Despite the slight tremor in his hand, Steve stepped forward again. Bending down onto one knee, Steve curled his hand around Tony’s ankle. He licked his lips in concentration before he finally stretched his hand and ever so carefully slid the razor up Tony’s leg.

The motion was addictive, made even more so by inches of tanned skin being revealed as the razor cleaned away streaks of white.

Tony’s breath hitched and Steve’s gaze snapped up to see his eyes squeezed tightly shut.

“Tony?” Steve’s voice was hushed, quiet. He didn’t dare move. “Are you okay?”

There was a pause and Steve’s heart thudded in his chest.

“Yes,” Tony finally breathed out and his shoulders relaxed a little more. “Keep going.”

And who was Steve to deny Tony anything?

Turning his gaze back to Tony’s leg, Steve concentrated on the back of the thigh that Tony had struggled to get. There was a slight streak of red that Steve brushed away with the pad of his thumb before he carefully slid the razor down three times, making sure that there were no hairs left on that section of Tony’s skin. He cleaned off the razor in between strokes, shaking it in a bowl of water at Tony’s side and wiping it on the clean towel he’d taken from Tony’s hand.

It was silent for a long time as Steve worked his way down to the back of Tony’s knee, concentrating like he’d never done before on this task. He winced when he caught a raised hair follicle and a drop of blood pooled, but Tony didn’t make a reaction.

“I think you’re done.” Steve cleared his throat and set the razor down on the side of the bath.

“With that leg,” Tony said, turning to look over his shoulder and smiling at Steve for the first time that evening. “I do have another.”

//

“Are you not going to ask why?”

Steve made some sort of noise in the back of his throat, continuing to card his hand through Tony’s hair as he kept his eyes closed. They’d finished in the bathroom and, after a thorough shower to clean Tony’s legs, Steve had tucked them both between fresh, silk sheets.

Tony nipped him on the collarbone, making Steve finally peek through narrowed eyes at the man at his side.

“What?”

“Don’t you want to know why?” Tony repeated, sliding his smooth leg up and down Steve’s hairy one.

The intimate action had heat pooling deep in Steve’s stomach and it was hard to focus on the words leaving Tony’s lips.

“No,” Steve finally managed to say. He let his hand dance from where it was curled around Tony’s on his chest to hitch Tony’s thigh up around his hips. Fingers dancing over the hairless skin of Tony’s leg, Steve’s eyes fluttered closed again. “Makes no difference to me. As long as I can be there to help you.”

Tony hooked his leg more securely around Steve’s body and let his hand curl over Steve’s heart. “Hm. I guess that wouldn’t be so bad.”

“Good. I like taking care of you.”

His answer was a soft kiss to his chest and Steve drifted off to sleep with a smile on his face.

Steve surged forward, hovering next to Tony. “Are you okay? Did you cut yourself?”

“Nicked it, I think,” Tony muttered, grimacing as a hand lifted to rest at the base of his spine. “But it was more my back. I can’t turn that way to see very well anymore.”

“Do you…” Steve trailed off and swallowed, eyes fixed on Tony’s leg. “Do you want a hand?”

Tony looked up with his eyes narrowed ever so slightly and when Steve met his gaze, he didn’t back down. “A hand?”

reblog.comment:
this fic contains talk of razors. though it is only shaving and no razor is specified, proceed with caution if need be x

“Tony? Are you in here?”

Steve stepped out of the elevator when it stopped on Tony’s floor, stifling a yawn behind his hand. It had been a long day, one that had dragged on and on and seemed like it was never going to end. All he wanted to do was crawl into bed and sleep all of his cares away.

He felt a little weird letting himself onto Tony’s floor. They’d been together for a few months and, whilst, Steve had explicit permission from Tony to let himself into Tony’s space whenever he wanted, he was still holding back. It felt strange to be there without Tony, without them stumbling into the wall when their attention was too wrapped up in the other.

“Tony?”

There was a muffled curse from the direction of the en-suite and Steve’s brow furrowed.

“Babe? Everything alright?”

There was another low curse and Steve’s feet started to take him towards Tony’s bedroom, worry taking over him. The bathroom door was open and the light on, a little steam still curling into the bedroom. Steve hesitated before poking his head into the room and any more questions he had died in his throat at the sight before him.

Tony was standing in front of his bathtub clad only in tight boxers that clung to every curve of his backside with one leg resting on the bath’s ceramic edge. A razor was clutched in his hand as he very carefully shaved from his ankle to his knee, wiping away shaving foam onto a blue towel in his hand.

“Hey,” Tony said softly, not looking up as he focused on his knee. “How was your day?”

“Fine,” Steve replied automatically, all of his attention solely on the way Tony’s thigh looked so wonderfully tanned against the sharp white of the streaks of foam on it and the contrast with the bath. Truth be told, he couldn’t remember a single detail about his day anymore. “What are you doing?”

“Shaving.” Tony wiped his razor and bent forward, rolling his foot to change the angle of his leg. When he bent forward a little too far, he winced and let out a muffled curse.

Steve surged forward, hovering next to Tony. “Are you okay? Did you cut yourself?”

“Nicked it, I think,” Tony muttered, grimacing as a hand lifted to rest at the base of his spine. “But it was more my back. I can’t turn that way to see very well anymore.”

“Do you…” Steve trailed off and swallowed, eyes fixed on Tony’s leg. “Do you want a hand?”

Tony looked up with his eyes narrowed ever so slightly and when Steve met his gaze, he didn’t back down. “A hand?”

[[MORE]]

“Yeah.” Steve cleared his throat and hunched in on himself a little. “I just thought that, what with your back, you might need help.”

Tony paused for a moment, enough to make Steve shrink back even further, before he relaxed minutely and silently held out his hand. Steve edged forward and carefully, oh so carefully, took the razor that was being handed to him.

“Where – where do I start?”

“Just follow the lines.” Tony’s voice was tight, almost as though he was holding his breath. “Just go where the foam is.”

Despite the slight tremor in his hand, Steve stepped forward again. Bending down onto one knee, Steve curled his hand around Tony’s ankle. He licked his lips in concentration before he finally stretched his hand and ever so carefully slid the razor up Tony’s leg.

The motion was addictive, made even more so by inches of tanned skin being revealed as the razor cleaned away streaks of white.

Tony’s breath hitched and Steve’s gaze snapped up to see his eyes squeezed tightly shut.

“Tony?” Steve’s voice was hushed, quiet. He didn’t dare move. “Are you okay?”

There was a pause and Steve’s heart thudded in his chest.

“Yes,” Tony finally breathed out and his shoulders relaxed a little more. “Keep going.”

And who was Steve to deny Tony anything?

Turning his gaze back to Tony’s leg, Steve concentrated on the back of the thigh that Tony had struggled to get. There was a slight streak of red that Steve brushed away with the pad of his thumb before he carefully slid the razor down three times, making sure that there were no hairs left on that section of Tony’s skin. He cleaned off the razor in between strokes, shaking it in a bowl of water at Tony’s side and wiping it on the clean towel he’d taken from Tony’s hand.

It was silent for a long time as Steve worked his way down to the back of Tony’s knee, concentrating like he’d never done before on this task. He winced when he caught a raised hair follicle and a drop of blood pooled, but Tony didn’t make a reaction.

“I think you’re done.” Steve cleared his throat and set the razor down on the side of the bath.

“With that leg,” Tony said, turning to look over his shoulder and smiling at Steve for the first time that evening. “I do have another.”

//

“Are you not going to ask why?”

Steve made some sort of noise in the back of his throat, continuing to card his hand through Tony’s hair as he kept his eyes closed. They’d finished in the bathroom and, after a thorough shower to clean Tony’s legs, Steve had tucked them both between fresh, silk sheets.

Tony nipped him on the collarbone, making Steve finally peek through narrowed eyes at the man at his side.

“What?”

“Don’t you want to know why?” Tony repeated, sliding his smooth leg up and down Steve’s hairy one.

The intimate action had heat pooling deep in Steve’s stomach and it was hard to focus on the words leaving Tony’s lips.

“No,” Steve finally managed to say. He let his hand dance from where it was curled around Tony’s on his chest to hitch Tony’s thigh up around his hips. Fingers dancing over the hairless skin of Tony’s leg, Steve’s eyes fluttered closed again. “Makes no difference to me. As long as I can be there to help you.”

Tony hooked his leg more securely around Steve’s body and let his hand curl over Steve’s heart. “Hm. I guess that wouldn’t be so bad.”

“Good. I like taking care of you.”

His answer was a soft kiss to his chest and Steve drifted off to sleep with a smile on his face.

summary:
pepper: y/n, at 2am in the morning i was just trying to cuddle with tony
pepper: when she opened the door right as i was about...
body:
pepper: y/n, at 2am in the morning i was just trying to cuddle with tony

pepper: when she opened the door right as i was about to kiss him goodnight!

pepper: i coulda lost my balance or chipped a tooth!

y/n: you think that’s annoying?

y/n: morgan came into my room last night when i was reenacting the gangplank scene from peter pan!!

rhodey: what the hell goes on at night in this house!?

blog.name: original-cypher
blog.title: Starting brand old.
blog.description:
Learning to let go, because when I cling, I dig in too hard and leave scars behind.
*
Alice. 32. I've survived too much to not make it though this time around too.
*
Here you'll fine. Kaylor. Stony. Larry. Silly things. Cats. Occasionally writing.

summary: I have been doing a MCU re-watch and by the end I am going to write a goddamn essay about how Tony has a soldier/badge/uniform...
body:
I have been doing a MCU re-watch and by the end I am going to write a goddamn essay about how Tony has a soldier/badge/uniform kink.

I’m not too far in, but even in a movie he has a cameo in, he manages to eye fuck a soldier.

If they wanted us to trace back a history of him having this little trait, they wouldn’t have written it otherwise.

“He likes the badge.” Honestly!

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: The Valkyries
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2WHaJS4

by Slytherclaws02

What if there was another secret organization that was actually devoted to world peace? The result is an all female group sent around the world to fix Shields mistakes. They’re starting with Shields biggest mistake…. the handling of Tony Stark.

Words: 1373, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of Valkyrian Chronicles

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Doctor Strange (2016), Iron Man (Movies), Black Panther (2018)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Pepper Potts, Stephen Strange, Steve Rogers, T'Challa (Marvel), Shuri (Marvel), James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Vision (Marvel), Wanda Maximoff, Clint Barton, Laura Barton, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Thor (Marvel), Bruce Banner
  • Relationships: Tony Stark/Stephen Strange, T'Challa (Marvel)/Original Female Character(s)
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Alternate Universe - Soulmates, Not Steve Friendly, Slow Burn, Civil War Team Iron Man, Light Angst, Not Wanda Friendly, Erik Killmonger Lives, Erik Killmonger Redemption

read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2WHaJS4

title: Effective Immediately

title: The Calendar Game Illustrations
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2xdFiUA

by apparentlytaboo

Tumblr links are apparently the bane of my existence, so here’s an additional ‘series,’ each chapter being a month from the calendar! I only have 8 of the 12 so far, and they aren’t 100% in order yet so bare with me ;) also, I do not have a #12 yet, so if there’s anyone you really want to see, please let me know!
